TextBody:
Hi Dipesh,

Thank you for reaching out.

Please verify whether you attached 2 bridged Network Adapters when you created the EPP VM.

If you have done this and are still unable to connect to the EPP UI, please let us know so we can investigate the issue further.

Thank you!
Best Regards,
Iosif Muntean| Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
 www.endpointprotector.com
